definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun used as a given name, typically masculine, of modern origin and popular in English-speaking countries. It may be a variant of 'Jason' or derived from the name 'Jace' as an independent given name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用作人名的专有名词，通常为男性名，起源于现代，在英语国家中较为流行。它可能是 'Jason' 的变体，或作为独立人名 'Jace' 使用。
definitions.example_en: Jace is studying computer science at university.
definitions.example_cn: 杰斯正在大学学习计算机科学。
